segment.target: Body swapped!
You've swapped bodies with this human. You will now live a new life...
Body swapped!
A Mush agent has swapped their body with yours. You will now live an entirely different life...
Mission sent.
You have received a new mission from the Commander. Go to the Tips tab.
Your mission “{missionContent}” has been accepted.
Your mission “{missionContent}” has been refused.
*Hinnnn* this object is critical to the crew's survival. You can't take it with you...
{character} started screaming and everyone returned to the ship double-quick!
You may consult {exploration_link} to discover what happened...
The expedition ended sooner than expected: all the explorers are dead!
You may consult {exploration_link} to discover what happened...
The exploration came back sooner than expected: nobody had a spacesuit!
You may consult {exploration_link} to discover what happened...
The expedition observes a Mankarog on the horizon passing behind a mountain... We should definitely change heading now to avoid any trouble.
You may consult {exploration_link} to discover what happened...
A violent tremor paralyses the expedition... And then silence again... best return to the Daedalus quick smart!
You may consult {exploration_link} to discover what happened...
With a muted groan, a nearby volcano starts to belch thick black smoke, you book it back to the Daedalus as fast as you can!
You may consult {exploration_link} to discover what happened...
Welcome back!
You may consult {exploration_link} to discover what happened...
You are stuck in the machine that took you on expedition doesn't have an oxygen-rich atmosphere and you have no spacesuit. You'll have to wait for your colleagues to finish their exploration.
You may consult {exploration_link} to discover what happened...
General Announcement
{message}////{character} / Day {day} - Cycle {cycle} // You may read this again anytime in the :tip: Tips channel.
Announcement broadcasted
{message}////{character} / Jour {day} - Cycle {cycle} // You may read this again anytime in the :tip: Tips channel.
That wasn't supposed to happen. In the heat of the action you hurt yourself...
Disgusting... You're filthy. (Not like that. Although...)
Welcome to the cause, dearest MUSH

Something has... changed. You feel different.////A calming serenity has overtaken you. You want to *share it* with your crewmates...////Comrade, **you are an agent of Mush**!////You can successfully complete your mission in two ways: by converting everyone to Mush, or by destroying the ship!////You'll begin your mission with **earned {quantity}** :triumph_mush:
